I enjoyed this movie thoroughly. It is definitely one of my favorites ever. This 720p MKV of it does it justice. I am amazed at how this movie file is only 597MB, yet it resembles a 5GB BluRay to a big extent. At a tenth of the size, the quality is remarkably similar and I wouldn't mind having this rip of the movie in my collection to watch again and again.

The download speed was also relatively quick. I finished downloading the movie in under 30 minutes. That is partly due to the fact that I have a fast connection, but nevertheless, faster than some of the torrents that are here on TPB.

I've downloaded many YIFY movies in the past and I must say that they've done an amazing job encoding BluRay movies into such a small size without compromising it's quality.

A must-download from TPB. Great work, YIFY. Keep it up.
